snippet.title: Katanaut - Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out action-packed gameplay from Katanaut in this trailer for the upcoming action-roguelite game with metroidvania elements. You fight your way through a collapsing space station where handcrafted rooms blend with procedural generation, offering fresh challenges on every run. Katanaut will be available in 2025 on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
